review: Paying for each App/channel ends up to be the same cost for cable. Most of the free channels are not worth watching.
author: NL

review: This is a very disappointing device.  I have very fast WiFi but this stick drops the signal and has to rebuffer repeatedly.  The Fire TV device is listed as not knowing IF it will be restocked.  Come on Amazon, WiFi just cannot handle HD programming without issues.
author: T. Berwick

review: Everything works as advertised, very good value for money
author: Gill Moran

review: Having problem with the sound cutting out. I don't have a problem with my TV Fire.
author: litehoss "Hoss"

review: Easy set-up, great instructions. Works quickly and is easy to operate. I wish I would have purchased this much sooner!
author: m

review: Love it! Makes my life so mush easier watching stuff on my TV instead of the tiny computer screen.
author: Stephanie

review: Great product, really enjoying it, received it as a gift!
author: Dawn
